abiertoTodoElAño: We are open all year round!
intro1: Looking for a place where green surrounds you?
intro2: Enjoy all the possibilities we offer

card1.title: Natural Pool
card1.description: Dive into the river’s pleasure, whether swimming or fishing.

card2.title: Barbecue
card2.description: Area with grills prepared to enjoy with family.

card3.title: Playground
card3.description: A space designed for children to have maximum fun.

servicio1: Our plots are large, shaded, and easily accessible.
temporadas: High season: 16/04/2025 – 01/09/2025 - Low season: Rest of the year

bungalows.title: Bungalows and Tipis
bungalows.description: Our bungalows offer a comfortable and fully equipped space for you to enjoy a pleasant stay surrounded by nature. Perfect for families or groups looking for practical accommodation with all comforts to relax after a day outdoors.

parcelas.title: Plots
parcelas.description: Our plots offer a comfortable and fully equipped space for you to enjoy a pleasant stay surrounded by nature. Perfect for families or groups looking for practical accommodation with all comforts to relax after a day outdoors.

fijos: If you are interested in joining our camping as a permanent resident, we will be happy to welcome you. Contact us for all the details.
